query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS answer_comparisons (
  id VARCHAR(128) PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  questionNumber INT NOT NULL,
  userSubmissionId VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL,
  comparedWithSubmissionId VARCHAR(128),
  
  -- Gap analysis results
  noveltyGap DECIMAL(3,1),
  coherenceGap DECIMAL(3,1),
  rigorGap DECIMAL(3,1),
  synthesisGap DECIMAL(3,1),
  formalizationGap DECIMAL(3,1),
  depthGap DECIMAL(3,1),
  
  -- AI-generated insights
  overallAnalysis TEXT,
  noveltyRecommendations TEXT,
  coherenceRecommendations TEXT,
  rigorRecommendations TEXT,
  synthesisRecommendations TEXT,
  formalizationRecommendations TEXT,
  depthRecommendations TEXT,
  
  -- Metadata
  comparisonModel VARCHAR(50),
  comparisonTime INT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  
  INDEX idx_user_question (userId, questionNumber),
  INDEX idx_submission (userSubmissionId)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;

mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3Kbp5zTLhkwYq6S.fc90773ccd92 --database UKEMaqQ27z6bQYJkt3g4ve --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS answer_comparisons (

  formalizationGap DECIMAL(3,1),

  -- AI-generated insights
  overallAnalysis TEXT,
  noveltyRecommendations TEXT,
  coherenceRecommendations TEXT,
  rigorRecommendations TEXT,
  synthesisRecommendations TEXT,
  formalizationRecommendations TEXT,

  -- Metadata
  comparisonModel VARCHAR(50),

  INDEX idx_user_question (userId, questionNumber),
  INDEX idx_submission (userSubmissionId)
